scripts.setup: npm install && cd team-schedule-api && npm install
scripts.dev: node ./scripts/kill-port.mjs 8787 && concurrently -n web,api -c '#00bcd4,#ff9800' 'vite --host --port 5173' 'npm --prefix team-schedule-api run dev'
scripts.dev:all-legacy: node ./scripts/kill-port.mjs 8787 && concurrently -n web,proxy -c '#00bcd4,#8bc34a' 'vite --host' 'npm --prefix dev-server run dev'
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && (test -f public/CNAME && cp -f public/CNAME dist/CNAME || true) && mkdir -p dist/schedule2 && cp -a dist/assets dist/schedule2/ && (test -f dist/sw.js && cp -f dist/sw.js dist/schedule2/sw.js || true) && cp -f dist/index.html dist/404.html && cp -f dist/index.html dist/schedule2/index.html && cp -f dist/index.html dist/schedule2/404.html
scripts.predeploy:gh: VITE_SCHEDULE_API_BASE=https://team-schedule-api.phorbie.workers.dev GHPAGES_BASE=/schedule2/ vite build && rm -f dist/CNAME && mkdir -p dist/schedule2 && cp -a dist/assets dist/schedule2/ && (test -f dist/sw.js && cp -f dist/sw.js dist/schedule2/sw.js || true) && (test -f dist/site.webmanifest && cp -f dist/site.webmanifest dist/schedule2/site.webmanifest || true) && (test -f dist/favicon.svg && cp -f dist/favicon.svg dist/schedule2/favicon.svg || true) && cp -f dist/index.html dist/404.html && cp -f dist/index.html dist/schedule2/index.html && cp -f dist/index.html dist/schedule2/404.html
scripts.predeploy:domain: VITE_SCHEDULE_API_BASE=https://api.teamschedule.cc vite build && (test -f public/CNAME && cp -f public/CNAME dist/CNAME || true) && mkdir -p dist/schedule2 && cp -a dist/assets dist/schedule2/ && (test -f dist/sw.js && cp -f dist/sw.js dist/schedule2/sw.js || true) && (test -f dist/site.webmanifest && cp -f dist/site.webmanifest dist/schedule2/site.webmanifest || true) && (test -f dist/favicon.svg && cp -f dist/favicon.svg dist/schedule2/favicon.svg || true) && cp -f dist/index.html dist/404.html && cp -f dist/index.html dist/schedule2/index.html && cp -f dist/index.html dist/schedule2/404.html
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.ci:full: npm run guard:hosts && npm run ci && npm run build && npm run smoke
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && vite build --mode development
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix team-schedule-api ci || npm --prefix team-schedule-api i
